channel.title: Magebank - formally "HackScape" | Looking for staff! (317)
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Lucida Console]MAGEBANK[/FONT][/CENTER]
[CENTER][URL=http://"http://magebank.org"]MAGEBANK.ORG[/URL][/CENTER]
[CENTER]Who we are[/CENTER] [CENTER]We started off as a small server back in 2008 known as HackScape. It was booming we had over 500 players active playing at once. Even though we had an auto-restarter set every 60 minutes :fp: After years of playing and having fun things went on and people moved on. We've been up and down for a while but our main problem was we never really advertised and now we're here to make a change. [/CENTER]
[CENTER]Every server has the same thing... They always post the same kinda thread. Well I'm gonna keep this short and sweet and only put tell you about our best features! :)[/CENTER]
[CENTER][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QXacx-VJMuw[/youtube][/CENTER]
[CENTER][FONT=Lucida Console]Features[/FONT][/CENTER]
[ul][*] 99.9% Uptime (Server is super stable) [*] NO Dupes [*] Ranked Leaderboards (Multi PvP & Solo PvP) [*] Amazing combat system [*] 100% Anti-cheatable/Anti-Boosting PkPoint system (written from scratch) [*] Perfect Staking and Dueling system [*] Plenty of Minigames [*] Huge amount of Bosses to fight [*] ... and many more![/ul]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/A3Sm589.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/UHZt9FH.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/dADflrN.png[/img]

item.title: Magebank - formally "HackScape" | Looking for staff! (317)
item.dc:creator: @mbpvp mbpvp
item.description:
@mbpvp wrote:

[CENTER][FONT=Lucida Console]MAGEBANK[/FONT][/CENTER]

[CENTER][URL=http://“http://magebank.org”]MAGEBANK.ORG[/URL][/CENTER]

[CENTER]Who we are[/CENTER]
[CENTER]We started off as a small server back in 2008 known as HackScape. It was booming we had over 500 players active playing at once. Even though we had an auto-restarter set every 60 minutes :fp:
After years of playing and having fun things went on and people moved on. We’ve been up and down for a while but our main problem was we never really advertised and now we’re here to make a change.
[/CENTER]

[CENTER]Every server has the same thing… They always post the same kinda thread. Well I’m gonna keep this short and sweet and only put tell you about our best features! :)[/CENTER]

[CENTER][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QXacx-VJMuw[/youtube][/CENTER]

[CENTER][FONT=Lucida Console]Features[/FONT][/CENTER]

[ul][] 99.9% Uptime (Server is super stable)
[] NO Dupes
[] Ranked Leaderboards (Multi PvP & Solo PvP)
[] Amazing combat system
[] 100% Anti-cheatable/Anti-Boosting PkPoint system (written from scratch)
[] Perfect Staking and Dueling system
[] Plenty of Minigames
[] Huge amount of Bosses to fight
[*] … and many more![/ul]
